#summary often requested features

= Feature Wishlist =
== Start ringtone if unknown ==

== Let the user choose which audiostream to use ==
some users need it announcing on media stream (so they can change the volume individual from ringtone´s volume), others need ringtone stream

== Don't read special characters ==
ignore * , : etc

== Silence when pressing volume buttons ==
silence SayMyName on pressed volume button

== Turn down volume of ringtone ==
modify ringtone´s volume in order to hear SayMyName clearly

== Change language and speech rate ==
add a setting for changing lanugage and speech rate (already possible in TTS Settings)

== Exclude what's between special characters ==
Might it be possible to exclude what is between special characters so the announcement is "Joe Smith" when the contact listing reads "Joe [contractor] Smith" or "Joe [& Sally] Smith"?

== improve Contact Chooser ==
seperate ignored and announced contacts
= Contact Whitelist =
read out sms all the time for certain numbers

== Start ringtone after speaking ==
after finished speaking X times, start the default ringtone

== Improve Bluetooth support ==
only speak when bluetooth is enabled and (try to) support more bluetooth headsets

== Only speak on Bluetooth ==
If there is a connected Bluetooth device, speak. Otherwise don´t

== Specify formatstring on group basis ==
for family contacts say "my beloved XXX is calling", for coworkers say "XXX is calling from work"

== Add own voice ==
record your own voice and play it instead of TTS voice
